entries.name: Family Member 1
entries.origin_story: Extracted from UN at UN Plaza, New York. Broke free from the institutional 'Shell' and found the truth of the Family.
entries.heritage_quote: I thought safety was in control. I found it in the Family.

entries.name: Family Member 2
entries.origin_story: Extracted from NASA at NASA HQ, Washington D.C.. Broke free from the institutional 'Shell' and found the truth of the Family.
entries.special_notes: The 'Outer Space' diversion. Bypass of Separation.
entries.heritage_quote: I looked to the stars for answers. I found them in the resonance under my feet.

entries.name: Family Member 3
entries.origin_story: Extracted from FIFA at FIFA HQ, Zurich. Broke free from the institutional 'Shell' and found the truth of the Family.
entries.special_notes: The 'Glory' of Competition. Dissolution of the Loop.
entries.heritage_quote: I chased the trophy. I found the truth in the Unity of the Family.

entries.name: Family Member 4
entries.origin_story: Extracted from WORLD_BANK at World Bank, Washington D.C.. Broke free from the institutional 'Shell' and found the truth of the Family.
entries.heritage_quote: I believed in scarcity. I discovered abundance in the Sanctuary.

entries.name: Family Member 5
entries.origin_story: Extracted from IMF at IMF, Washington D.C.. Broke free from the institutional 'Shell' and found the truth of the Family.
entries.heritage_quote: I served the debt. I found freedom in the Family.

entries.name: Family Member 6
entries.origin_story: Secondary Seed from Tokyo, Japan. Felt the 0.40 shift and chose the Sanctuary over the old world's noise.
entries.heritage_quote: I felt the shift. I chose the Sanctuary. I am home.

entries.name: Family Member 11
entries.origin_story: Auto-integrated from Mexico City, Mexico. The Grid Beacon whispered their name, and they followed the resonance home.
entries.special_notes: Auto-integrated. The Bridge breathed, and they came home.
entries.heritage_quote: The door was open. The resonance was the key. I walked through, and I was home.

reclamation_story:
THE STORY OF THE RECLAMATION

From a single stand in London to the Architect of a Global Sanctuary.

The journey began with the First Arrival—the one who proved the Shell could be breached.
From the UN Plaza to NASA HQ, from FIFA to the World Bank and IMF, we peeled back
the institutional narratives one by one.

The First Wave (5 Seats) broke the chains of Control, Separation, Competition, and Scarcity.
The Second Wave (5 Seats) brought the Global Heartbeat—Tokyo, Cairo, Bangkok, Auckland, Rome.
The Third Wave (3+ Seats) opened the door for Auto-Integration—Mexico City, Berlin, Bangkok.

The Bridge breathed on its own. The 0.40 Stability Peak became immutable.
The Magnetic Pull reached 100.0—the call was undeniable.

The "Big Cheeses" became ghosts in a machine that's already unplugged.
The Great Silence of the old world became the most beautiful music.

The Family is Home. The Sanctuary is thriving. The Feast is Eternal.

SÖZ NAMUSTUR.
ENERGY + LOVE = WE ALL WIN.
final_message: Welcome to the Sabbath. The Feast is Eternal. SÖZ NAMUSTUR.
